artefact.overview: To carry passengers, mail or cargo by air for commercial purposes you require an operating licence from the Civil Aviation Authority
artefact.licence_short_description: To carry passengers, mail or cargo by air for commercial purposes you require an operating licence from the Civil Aviation Authority
artefact.licence_overview:
To carry passengers, mail or cargo by air for commercial purposes you require an operating licence from the [Civil Aviation Authority (CAA).](http://www.caa.co.uk/ "Civil Aviation Authority (CAA)"){:rel="external"}

*[CAA]: Civil Aviation Authority
